CustomField.description: Formula to determine all factors about widget activation status.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Activation_State__c, 'Active'), true, IF(ISPICKVAL(Activation_State__c, 'Date activated'), IF(AND(DATETIMEVALUE(Activation_Start_Date__c) <= DATETIMEVALUE(NOW()), DATETIMEVALUE(Activation_End_Date__c) >= DATETIMEVALUE(NOW())), true, false) , false) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this is checked all criteria are met for this widget to be active.
CustomField.label: Widget Is Active
